properties.name: Isle of Skye - Quiraing
properties.description: Dramatic otherworldly landscape of rolling green valleys, pinnacles, and sheer cliff drop-offs in Scotland

properties.name: Glencoe
properties.description: Scotland's most famous glen with dramatic mountain scenery and atmospheric beauty

properties.name: Isle of Skye - Neist Point
properties.description: Scotland's westernmost point on Skye with iconic lighthouse and spectacular ocean vistas

properties.name: Eilean Donan Castle
properties.description: Probably Scotland's most photographed castle, dramatically sited where three lochs meet

properties.name: Loch Ness & Urquhart Castle
properties.description: Iconic Scottish loch with atmospheric castle ruins overlooking the water

properties.name: Edinburgh Castle
properties.description: Iconic fortress dominating Edinburgh's skyline from its volcanic rock perch

properties.name: Stonehenge
properties.description: Prehistoric 5,000-year-old stone circle, one of world's most famous landmarks (UNESCO)

properties.name: Giant's Causeway
properties.description: 40,000 interlocking hexagonal basalt columns on Northern Ireland's coast (UNESCO)

properties.name: White Cliffs of Dover
properties.description: Iconic 107m chalk cliffs visible from France, symbol of Britain

properties.name: Tower Bridge
properties.description: London's iconic Victorian bascule bridge with glass walkway views

properties.name: Big Ben & Houses of Parliament
properties.description: Gothic Revival masterpiece with world's most famous clock tower (UNESCO)
